RelatedSentence: According to Loudoun County Fire-Rescue , just before 4 a.m. Monday emergency calls came in reporting a fire in the 200 Block of St. John Square in Sterling Park .

A0: Fire-rescue personnel from Sterling , Cascades , Kincora , Ashburn , Moorefield ,
RelatedSentence: Fire-rescue personnel from Sterling , Cascades , Kincora , Ashburn , Moorefield , Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority , and Fairfax County responded to the incident .
The first firefighters on scene discovered a fire in the backyard of one of the townhouses .

Firefighters were able to contain the fire , but because of significant fire and smoke damage to two of the townhouses and smoke damage to two others , 15 people have been unable to return to their homes .
The Loudoun County Fire Marshal 's Office concluded the fire was accidental , caused by an outdoor fire pit with contents that had not been properly extinguished .
